#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

	int t,n;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		int arr[10001];
		int i,sum=0;
		for ( i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin >> arr[i];
			//sum += arr[i];
		}
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		for ( i=0;i<n/2;i++)
		{
			sum += (arr[n-1-i]-arr[i])+ (arr[n-2-i]-arr[i]);
		}

		cout << sum+arr[n-1] << " " << arr[n-1] <<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
